description: THE NEWTON INSTITUTE® (North Carolina) was established in 2002 by bestselling author Michael Newton. As the foremost organization for past-life and between life studies, the Institute includes members in 26 countries and conducts its popular Life Between Life training seminars around the world. Wisdom from the Spirit World  has been compiled by prominent members of the Institute’s research committee: Dr. Ann Clark, Dr. Joanne Selinske, Marilyn Hargreaves and Karen Joy.
name: The Newton Institute
